ygData.subject: Re: Dark Reaver
ygData.msgSnippet: I tend to disagree.  The ShadowKnight class by nature is basically the exact opposite as Paladins.  So a 2h sword would make sense. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
I tend to disagree. The ShadowKnight class by nature is basically the exact
opposite as Paladins. So a 2h sword would make sense.
-----Original Message-----
From: WildMage79@... <WildMage79@...>
To: shadowknight@onelist.com <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, April 22, 1999 11:29 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Dark Reaver


>From: WildMage79@...
>
>It is most likely a 1 handed sword becuase it's counterpart Ghoulsbane
is
>a 1 hand slashing paladin only weapon which may make the Dark Reaver 1
handed
>slashing instead of 2
